casebody.data:
Harper A. BUSBY, Appellant, v. Samuel O. WILLIAMS, Appellee. No. 8424. Circuit Court of Appeals, Sixth Circuit. June 27, 1940. Faust, Faust, Medias & Faust, of Indianapolis, Ind., and W. A. Rinckhoff, of Cincinnati, Ohio, for appellant. Smith, Francis & Irvine, of Steubenville, Ohio, for appellee.

Before SIMONS, HAMILTON, and ARANT, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The Court perceiving no error of law in the trial below or in the denial of the motion for new trial, it is ordered that the judgment be, and it is hereby, affirmed.
